name: Elly the kid
description:
Elly the kid is a story about a Likud voter that lives in the biggest Kibbutz in Israel, amongst the many Smolanim that suspect his actions.

After a rock was throuwn at his window and broke it, Elly-Eyal had decided to go underground in order to continue his mission to convet the people of the Kibbutz to  Likud voters.
Now, without anyone to see, you can sneak into his house and discover the truth about the mysterious Likud voter and uncover his plans and true beliefs.
